author: Lesley Waters
method: Place all the ingredients into a food processor and blend into a smooth purée. Pour the mixture into four shot glasses and serve immediately.
ingredients: ½ mango peeled, stone removed and sliced,  ½ lime, zest only,  1 lime, juice only,  50g/1¾oz ice cubes,  55ml/2fl oz sparkling mineral water,  1 tbsp honey
